code: import React from'react';import{Navigate,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import{useAuth}from'../../contexts/AuthContext';import Loading from'../common/Loading';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProtectedRoute=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const{isAuthenticated,isLoading}=useAuth();const location=useLocation();if(isLoading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Loading,{text:"\u0110ang ki\u1EC3m tra x\xE1c th\u1EF1c..."});}if(!isAuthenticated){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/login",state:{from:location},replace:true});}return children;};export default ProtectedRoute;
